name: Punk Hazard Arc
description: The Straw Hats enter the New World and arrive at Punk Hazard, a former government research facility. They encounter Caesar Clown, form an alliance with Trafalgar Law, and begin their plan to take down Yonko Kaidou.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats leave Punk Hazard, marking the end of their time on the island.
keyEvents.significance: One of the final episodes of the Punk Hazard arc, transitioning to the journey toward Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Kuzan Appears on Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Kuzan's mysterious appearance on Punk Hazard adds a final twist to the arc's conclusion.
keyEvents.significance: Provides closure to the conflict on Punk Hazard while raising new questions.
